Title: Medama Oyaji no April Fools'
Description: ["An April Fools' Day prank between ", Gegege no Kitarou (2018), ' and Fuji TV. It shows Medama Oyaji playing around with the Fuji TV mascot, since both the anime and these prank shorts aired on that TV channel. Toei Animation posted a compilation of all 3 shorts on their official YouTube channel.']
